maneuver.name: Agile Feint
maneuver.short: Gain advantage against a nearby creature.

maneuver.name: Anticipate Spell
maneuver.short: Attack an adjacent creature which tries to cast a spell.

maneuver.name: Any Weapon Stance
maneuver.short: Focusing on your in depth training with certain weaponry gives you proficiency with all weapons.

maneuver.name: Armor Lock
maneuver.short: Use an enemy’s armor against them, paralyzing them.

maneuver.name: Assisted Roll
maneuver.short: Roll away from an opponent who misses you.

maneuver.name: Back To Back
maneuver.short: Both you and an adjacent ally gain +2 AC.

maneuver.name: Battering Strike
maneuver.short: Knock your opponent’s weapon flying.

maneuver.name: Blinding Blow Stance
maneuver.short: Attack in a shifting flow of deft strikes that make it easy to blind enemies.

maneuver.name: Blinding Strikes
maneuver.short: Deprive your opponents of any ability to see, whether with their eyes or otherwise.

maneuver.name: Blind Instinct
maneuver.short: Briefly see without the use of sight and use a reaction to chase down a fleeing enemy.

maneuver.name: Blindshot
maneuver.short: Attack hidden targets without disadvantage.

maneuver.name: Bloody Roar
maneuver.short: Unleash a powerful yell that injures and frightens your foes.

maneuver.name: Bodyguard
maneuver.short: Take a hit for an ally and reduce the damage it inflicts on you.

maneuver.name: Bounding Strike
maneuver.short: Jump at an enemy and use your ability check as your attack roll.

maneuver.name: Branding Steel
maneuver.short: Brand a foe to make it reticent to approach or attack you.

maneuver.name: Break Spell
maneuver.short: Make a melee attack against an enemy casting a spell.

maneuver.name: Brotherhood Stance
maneuver.short: Take the Help action whenever you hit with a melee weapon attack.

maneuver.name: Burning Embers of Faith
maneuver.short: Use a reaction when you would be reduced to 0 hit points to heal yourself.

maneuver.name: Catch Your Breath
maneuver.short: Pause to regain hit points.

maneuver.name: Cavalier Stance
maneuver.short: Increase your mount’s AC.

maneuver.name: Charge
maneuver.short: Move and make a melee attack.

maneuver.name: Cleaving Swing
maneuver.short: Make an additional attack with a heavy weapon.

maneuver.name: Countershot
maneuver.short: Shoot a missile out of the air.

maneuver.name: Covering Fire
maneuver.short: Protect an ally from opportunity attack.

maneuver.name: Crushing Blow
maneuver.short: Paralyze your opponent with a heavy weapon.

maneuver.name: Dangerous Signature
maneuver.short: Cut a symbol into your target in order to frighten it.

maneuver.name: Dangerous Strikes
maneuver.short: Score critical hits on a roll of 19–20 for one round.

maneuver.name: Dashing Razor
maneuver.short: Charge forward to strike an enemy and feed off of the adrenaline from hitting, increasing your Speed.

maneuver.name: Death Blow
maneuver.short: Make an attack that critically hits and possibly even incapacitates your opponent.

maneuver.name: Deceptive Stance
maneuver.short: Gain an expertise die on Deception and Sleight of Hand checks in combat.

maneuver.name: Deflect Strike
maneuver.short: Reduce damage from an attack.

maneuver.name: Defy Magic
maneuver.short: Make a spellcaster miss you with its spell attack.

maneuver.name: Devoted Assault
maneuver.short: Ignoring other enemies allows you to strike one foe more accurately.

maneuver.name: Disarming Assault
maneuver.short: Knock your enemy’s weapon or shield from their grasp.

maneuver.name: Disarming Counter
maneuver.short: Your enemy drops their weapon when they miss you.

maneuver.name: Discerning Strike
maneuver.short: Learn the health and defenses of opponents you damage.

maneuver.name: Dispelling Assault
maneuver.short: Your attacks are critical hits on rolls of 19–20 and they end spells.

maneuver.name: Disrupting Charge
maneuver.short: Dart up to an opponent casting a spell and strike them, possibly disrupting the magic.

maneuver.name: Dive For Cover
maneuver.short: Use your reaction to take cover behind a creature or object when a ranged attack misses you.

maneuver.name: Doubleshot
maneuver.short: Fire two missiles and do extra damage.

maneuver.name: Double Tackle
maneuver.short: You and an ally knock a creature prone.

maneuver.name: Doubleteam
maneuver.short: A nearby ally can push a creature as a bonus action.

maneuver.name: Doubletime
maneuver.short: You and up to 3 allies can disengage and move their Speed.

maneuver.name: Douse
maneuver.short: Dash a container of liquid over a nearby foe.

maneuver.name: Drive Back
maneuver.short: Push your foe 10 feet on a hit.

maneuver.name: Dual Grapple
maneuver.short: You and an ally restrain a creature.

maneuver.name: Expert Sidestep
maneuver.short: Gain an AC bonus when you are hit.

maneuver.name: Expert Tumble
maneuver.short: Increase your AC as long as you move at full Speed.

maneuver.name: Exploit Footing
maneuver.short: Trip a creature which misses you.

maneuver.name: Eye Slash
maneuver.short: Blind your enemy with a well-aimed strike.

maneuver.name: Faith Within
maneuver.short: Reroll a saving throw when charmed, frightened, poisoned, or stunned.

maneuver.name: Farshot Stance
maneuver.short: Increase the range of your missiles.

maneuver.name: Feinting Strike
maneuver.short: Use a Sleight of Hand check as your attack bonus.

maneuver.name: First Blood
maneuver.short: React to danger with unnatural swiftness.

maneuver.name: Flowing Form
maneuver.short: Make melee attacks against all enemies who miss you.

maneuver.name: Flowing Steps Stance
maneuver.short: Ignore difficult terrain and be better able to resist being immobilized.

maneuver.name: Follow-Up Topple
maneuver.short: Attack a creature an ally has attacked to knock it prone.

maneuver.name: Force Hesitation
maneuver.short: Trick a creature into not attacking anyone but you.

maneuver.name: Furious Barrage
maneuver.short: Make a frenetic series of attacks until one of your strikes misses.

maneuver.name: Gaze Of Conviction
maneuver.short: Force a creature to attack you.

maneuver.name: Gut Strike
maneuver.short: Strike your enemy and cause fatigue.

maneuver.name: Hear The Wind
maneuver.short: Concentrate on what you can hear to see what cannot be seen and deftly evade attacks.

maneuver.name: Heart Of The Sword
maneuver.short: Focusing on your training with a weapon, you make your attacks more devastating and ignore an enemy’s defenses.

maneuver.name: Heartseeker
maneuver.short: Aim for and exploit a foe’s weak spot with a dangerous shot.

maneuver.name: Heavy Stance
maneuver.short: Gain an expertise die on Athletics checks and saving throws against combat maneuvers, and reduce difficult terrain.

maneuver.name: Heightened Concentration
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to retain concentration when you would otherwise lose it.

maneuver.name: Heightened Reflexes
maneuver.short: Gain additional reactions for this round.

maneuver.name: Horizon Shot
maneuver.short: Use a ranged weapon to attack to shoot a creature from as far away as you can see.

maneuver.name: Hurl Ally
maneuver.short: Throw a smaller ally at a creature within 20 feet.

maneuver.name: Imposing Glare
maneuver.short: Frighten a nearby foe.

maneuver.name: Instant Strike
maneuver.short: Quickly draw a melee weapon and attack a creature.

maneuver.name: Instinctive Counterattack
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to make a melee attack.

maneuver.name: Iron Will
maneuver.short: Get advantage to resist being charmed or frightened.

maneuver.name: Knockdown Assault
maneuver.short: Knock your target prone when you hit with a melee attack.

maneuver.name: Lancer Strike
maneuver.short: Deal extra damage and knock your target prone with a lance.

maneuver.name: Launched Strike
maneuver.short: Leap from your mount to score a critical hit against an enemy.

maneuver.name: Leading Throw
maneuver.short: Use your reaction to throw an enemy who misses you.

maneuver.name: Lean Into It
maneuver.short: Knock your target prone when you hit with a melee attack.

maneuver.name: Leaping Strike
maneuver.short: Move up to 40 feet and either push or knock your target prone.

maneuver.name: Legion Stance
maneuver.short: An ally can attack a foe you hit with a critical hit.

maneuver.name: Look At Me!
maneuver.short: Turn your weapon attacks into distractions that allow allies to move through the battlefield more freely.

maneuver.name: Mercurial Striking Stance
maneuver.short: Focus on making every hit with a natural weapon, unarmed strike, or dual-wielding weapon have a satisfying impact.

maneuver.name: Mind Over Body
maneuver.short: Reduce the damage you take.

maneuver.name: Missile Volley
maneuver.short: Attack a group of creatures within 10 feet of a focal point.

maneuver.name: Mistaken Opportunity
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to turn a strike that misses into an attack against a different opponent.

maneuver.name: Mounted Charge
maneuver.short: Move your mount’s Speed and gain advantage on your first attack.

maneuver.name: Mugging Hit
maneuver.short: Make a Sleight of Hand check against a creature you have hit.

maneuver.name: Mundane Missile Stance
maneuver.short: Give nearly any weapon the thrown property.

maneuver.name: Off-Balancing Strikes
maneuver.short: Knock your target off-balance, reducing its Speed and agility.

maneuver.name: Painful Pickpocket
maneuver.short: Use your reaction to make a Sleight of Hand check against a target which hits you.

maneuver.name: Parrying Counter
maneuver.short: Increase your AC against one creature and gain a free attack if it misses you.

maneuver.name: Perceptive Stance
maneuver.short: Enhance your perception.

maneuver.name: Perfect Assault
maneuver.short: Exhaust your exertion pool to transform all of your attacks into combat maneuvers.

maneuver.name: Perfect Edge Stance
maneuver.short: Focus on making your strikes as devastating as possible, increasing how often you score a critical hit.

maneuver.name: Perplexing Flurry
maneuver.short: Cause your enemy to suffer disadvantage while you focus all your attacks on them.

maneuver.name: Pickpocket
maneuver.short: Use your reaction to make a Sleight of Hand check.

maneuver.name: Pilfer Object
maneuver.short: Move next to an enemy about to use an item and take it from their hands.

maneuver.name: Point Blank Shot
maneuver.short: Use a bonus action to make ranged weapon attacks in melee without disadvantage.

maneuver.name: Practiced Roll
maneuver.short: Move 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

maneuver.name: Preternatural Strikes
maneuver.short: Strike targets who normally require magic.

maneuver.name: Primal Intercept
maneuver.short: Attack a creature which grapples you.

maneuver.name: Prodigious Leap
maneuver.short: Use a reaction and spur your mount to jump impossible distances.

maneuver.name: Purge Magic
maneuver.short: Make a melee attack against an enemy casting a spell.

maneuver.name: Quickdraw
maneuver.short: Use your reaction to draw a weapon and make a ranged attack when initiative is rolled.

maneuver.name: Rake
maneuver.short: Do extra damage when making multiple attacks.

maneuver.name: Raking Strikes
maneuver.short: On a hit, hit the target again with disadvantage.

maneuver.name: Rallying Cry
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to inspire an ally to fight onward when they take a hit.

maneuver.name: Rapid Drink
maneuver.short: Quickly consume or administer a potion.

maneuver.name: Rapid Strike
maneuver.short: Make an additional attack against a creature you have hit.

maneuver.name: Reactive Knockdown
maneuver.short: Trip your foe as an opportunity attack.

maneuver.name: Rearing Menace
maneuver.short: Frighten nearby foes from atop your mount.

maneuver.name: Reassuring Pat
maneuver.short: Encourage your mount and restore some of its hit points.

maneuver.name: Redirect
maneuver.short: Redirect an attack to strike an adjacent creature.

maneuver.name: Reflect Attack
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to turn an attacker’s strike back upon them.

maneuver.name: Retributive Blow
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to respond to a weapon attack with a strike of your own that disrupts a foe’s offensive.

maneuver.name: Ricochet
maneuver.short: Ignore your target’s cover with a ranged attack.

maneuver.name: Ride Enemy
maneuver.short: Jump onto a larger creature.

maneuver.name: Riding Leap
maneuver.short: Increase the size of your mount’s jump.

maneuver.name: Rolling Strike
maneuver.short: Move and make a melee attack.

maneuver.name: Sacrifice Mount
maneuver.short: Make your mount the target of an attack.

maneuver.name: Saddled Blows
maneuver.short: On a hit, make your target confused, prone, or slowed.

maneuver.name: Sharpened Awareness
maneuver.short: Use a reaction when attacked to evade by relying on your Perception, gaining an edge on your attacker with a successful dodge.

maneuver.name: Shield Wall
maneuver.short: Adjacent allies with shields gain +2 AC.

maneuver.name: Shoulder Check
maneuver.short: Shove a creature 10 feet when it attacks an ally.

maneuver.name: Shrug It Off
maneuver.short: Use your reaction to avoid being frightened, poisoned, or stunned.

maneuver.name: Speed Over Strength
maneuver.short: Make a quick attack against a large foe or a foe which attacks you with a heavy weapon.

maneuver.name: Spell Shattering Strike
maneuver.short: Disrupt an enemy’s spellcasting and fray the magic to disorient them as well.

maneuver.name: Spinning Parry
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to evade an opponent’s attack and swap places with your attacker, stunning them.

maneuver.name: Spirited Whistle
maneuver.short: As long as you can see your mount with but a whistle it rushes to your side.

maneuver.name: Springing Stance
maneuver.short: Increase your jump distances.

maneuver.name: Spur Mount
maneuver.short: Grant advantage to your mount’s ability checks and saving throws.

maneuver.name: Stand Tall Stance
maneuver.short: Be bigger than you really are.

maneuver.name: Steal Momentum
maneuver.short: Make a quick strike against a foe that moves within your reach and arrest their movement.

maneuver.name: Steely Steed Stance
maneuver.short: Fight with and alongside your mount, altering your assault to make it deadlier and harder to hurt.

maneuver.name: Striding Swings
maneuver.short: Move up to 15 feet though hostile spaces.

maneuver.name: Strike the Cracks Stance
maneuver.short: Focus on weak spots to deal more critical hits that inflict more damage.

maneuver.name: Stunning Assault
maneuver.short: Stun your target with a successful attack.

maneuver.name: Swift Stance
maneuver.short: Increase your Speed by 5 feet.

maneuver.name: Take Weapon
maneuver.short: Snatch your foe’s weapon away when they miss you.

maneuver.name: Throwing Stance
maneuver.short: Give your weapon the rebounding and thrown properties.

maneuver.name: Tidal Parry
maneuver.short: Use a reaction when hit with an attack to possibly turn it into a miss.

maneuver.name: Trample
maneuver.short: Move and knock those in your path prone.

maneuver.name: Trickshot
maneuver.short: Perform an impressive trick with a ranged weapon attack.

maneuver.name: Tsunami Dash
maneuver.short: Flow past your enemies and deliver a strike against each of them.

maneuver.name: Twist The Blade
maneuver.short: Use a reaction to turn a roll of 18 or more into a critical hit.

maneuver.name: Unbreakable
maneuver.short: Defy death.

maneuver.name: United We Stand
maneuver.short: Fall upon an enemy in concert with your allies and make their attacks more effective with every blow struck.

maneuver.name: Unsettling Injury
maneuver.short: Make your target unable to cast spells or use combat maneuvers.

maneuver.name: Unstoppable
maneuver.short: Prevent yourself from being paralyzed, petrified, or stunned.

maneuver.name: Unyielding
maneuver.short: Heal yourself when reduced to 0 hit points.

maneuver.name: Use The Pain
maneuver.short: Get a free attack against a foe who scores a critical hit against you.

maneuver.name: Victory Pose
maneuver.short: Grant allies advantage on death saving throws when you score a critical hit.

maneuver.name: Warding Wield
maneuver.short: Increase your AC by 2 for one round.

maneuver.name: Warning Strike
maneuver.short: Stop a creature from moving away from you.

maneuver.name: Wary Stance
maneuver.short: Gain an expertise die on Insight checks and increase your passive Insight score.

maneuver.name: Wheeling Charge
maneuver.short: Caper about an enemy and rain down attacks from atop your mount, circling back with every strike.

maneuver.name: Whirlpool Strike
maneuver.short: Attack all creatures adjacent to you and deal extra damage.

maneuver.name: Whirlwind Strike
maneuver.short: Attack all creatures adjacent to you.

maneuver.name: Wild Capering
maneuver.short: Move and gain a climb speed.

maneuver.name: Wild Swing
maneuver.short: Turn a miss with a heavy weapon into an attack against a different target.

maneuver.name: Wind Strike
maneuver.short: Make a strike so superb that the wake it cuts through the air damages an enemy beyond your reach.

maneuver.name: World-Shaking Strike
maneuver.short: Create a massive shockwave by striking the ground with a heavy weapon.

maneuver.name: Wounded Animal Gambit
maneuver.short: Pretend to die and then strike when an opponent makes themself vulnerable.

maneuver.name: Wounding Strike
maneuver.short: Cause ongoing damage to your target.

maneuver.name: Zealous Stance
maneuver.short: Gain expertise dice on attacks in exchange for granting expertise dice to your foes.
